name: Time Trial (MrCafecito)
description:
Story

You take control of the Temporal Hero,  sent to stop the villainy of Count Tempo, a man who has gained control of time itself, and is now using his power to manipulate things to his liking.

Armed with the Time Talisman you are immune to Count Tempo's time control; however, while the government time-proofed you, Tempo  was more intelligent than everyone and applied a special curse to himself that decreases your time to live each time you hit him, making the battle a high stakes challenge.

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move the Temporal Hero.

Press the Space bar to jump.

Press Z to shoot.

Core Mechanic

Each time you hit Count Tempo with one of your projectiles, you will lose 10 seconds of your total, so you must be mindful of how many more times can you hit him until you run out of time and trying to defeat him at the same time.
